title: 'Nightmare' Shaw's remarkable 100 goals for Man City
subtitle: Khadija Shaw is a "nightmare" to play against says Aston Villa manager Natalia Arroyo after she reaches 103 goals in 120 appearances for Man City.
full_text: Khadija Shaw is a "nightmare" to play against says Aston Villa manager Natalia Arroyo after she reaches 103 goals in 120 appearances for Man City.
